name: Ext_R5_SpecimenDefinition_version
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SpecimenDefinition.version for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SpecimenDefinition.version from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SpecimenDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the SpecimenDefinition author and is not expected to be globally unique.
element.comment: `SpecimenDefinition.version` has no related element in R4B:SpecimenDefinition

element.definition: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the SpecimenDefinition author and is not expected to be globally unique.
element.comment: `SpecimenDefinition.version` has no related element in R4B:SpecimenDefinition
